hackathon.name: Monad Biliz 2 Bengaluru
hackathon.description: Join the second edition of Monad Biliz in Bengaluru, India's tech hub. Build innovative blockchain solutions on Monad with cutting-edge performance and scalability.
hackathon.tagline: Building the future of blockchain in Bengaluru

12.tagline: The ultimate hackathon platform for Web3
12.description: MonadArena is a comprehensive platform for discovering hackathons, exploring innovative projects, and staking on winning teams. Built on Monad blockchain, it provides real-time updates, project analytics, and a seamless staking experience for the Web3 community.

13.tagline: Social tipping platform for Web3 creators
13.description: M DAO is an innovative decentralized gaming platform built on Monad blockchain that combines the excitement of gaming with the power of decentralized autonomous organizations. Players can participate in various games, earn rewards, and participate in governance decisions through the DAO structure. Built specifically for Monad's high-performance environment, M DAO offers fast transaction speeds, low gas costs, and an immersive gaming experience. The platform features multiple game modes, NFT rewards, and a community-driven governance system where players have a say in the platform's future development.

14.description: Monkoala is a revolutionary social tipping platform built on Monad blockchain that enables seamless micro-transactions and tipping for content creators, streamers, and social media influencers. Leveraging Monad's high-performance infrastructure, Monkoala provides instant, low-cost tipping experiences that empower creators to monetize their content directly from their audience. The platform features real-time notifications, creator analytics, and a user-friendly interface that makes supporting your favorite creators as easy as a click.
